item.title: Hello World
item.description: How did all start? I was looking for a static site generator, found out hugo. First I used brew install hugo, created local folder and used git init after that i just used hugo’s commands.
item.content:
How did all start?

I was looking for a static site generator, found out hugo. First I used brew install hugo, created local folder and used git init after that i just used hugo’s commands.
